q: What does the acronym REST (RESTful API endpoints) stand for?
a: Representational State Transfer. A representation of a resource is received when requested. This puts the client in a certain state. Such state changes when new resources are requested; thus a transfer of state.

q: What is the difference between precision and accuracy?
a: Accuracy is the degree to which a given quanity equals the true quanity. Precision is the degree to which repeated measurements under same conditions show the same result
